title: Directx error has occurred league of legends cannot start
body:
_**Dear Riot ,**_

I have **no idea** how to fix this , ive had this error for more than 6 mouths , ive tried to fix it multiple times , i really dont know , tried alot of videos on how to fix it , didnt work , look on forums , tried to fix it , didnt work . **Please Help me** , i really miss playing League , and i want to get back on the game ;( {{item:3070}} {{champion:77}}

replies.body: Most of the time that kind of error is caused when your graphics drivers are interacting with League in the correct way. Double check that your [**DirectX drivers**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#wq3) are all up to date and go ahead and run through the rest of the steps in that guide as well.
